tool_description: Detects scheduling conflicts when proposing meeting times against existing calendar commitments, providing conflict severity assessment.

existing_calendar_events.description: Array of existing calendar events for conflict checking

participant_emails.description: Email addresses of meeting participants to check conflicts for

buffer_minutes.description: Buffer time in minutes to add before and after meetings

conflict_tolerance.description: Conflict tolerance level: strict, moderate, or flexible

error_messages: Invalid proposed meeting time: Must be a valid ISO 8601 timestamp in the future.
Invalid duration: proposed_duration_minutes must be between 15 and 480 minutes.
Invalid calendar events format: Each event must be a properly formatted event string.
Invalid participant emails: One or more email addresses are not properly formatted.
Invalid buffer time: buffer_minutes must be between 0 and 60 minutes.
Invalid conflict tolerance: Use one of [strict, moderate, flexible].
usage: Provide proposed_meeting_time, proposed_duration_minutes, existing_calendar_events, and participant_emails. Optionally set buffer_minutes and conflict_tolerance. Returns detailed conflict analysis with severity levels.

conflicted_participants.description: Email addresses of participants with conflicts

conflict_details.description: Detailed descriptions of each conflict found

severity_level.description: Overall conflict severity: low, medium, high, or critical
